item.description:
Please RSVP

 

How to Get in Early on Winning Stocks Using IBD - Part 1 - IBD 50 and Your Weekly Review

Kier McDonough will be presenting. For those of you who don't know, Kier runs Brigos Capital Management on CANSLIM principles and has taught Level I and Level II courses for Investors Business Daily.

 

If you haven't been to an IBD meetup in a while, please come.

 
Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: How to Get in Early on Winning Stocks Using IBD - Part 1
